1133540.name: Grid Wars
1133540.description:
Hello from Digital Madness Studios.

I have been developing GRID WARS as a passion project for nearly 3 years.

This is my first game and do apologies for any bugs or errors your may find.


EARLY ACCESS

As an Early Access title it still has quite a journey ahead of it but I am very happy with where it stands today and am very proud of what I have created!
I Am also very excited for you guys to start blasting your way through hordes of virtual blood and guts and fighting for that number 1 spot on the leader boards!

I also look forward to hearing from you guys with any feedback and suggestions that you have.
Discord below!

SEE YOU ON THE GRID!!!




    -Key Features-

      300 INTENSE WAVES OF PEW PEW PEW!!!

      • COLOURFUL EXPLOSIONS!

      Power Ups!

      • MISSILES, TRIPLE SHOTS, SPEED BOOST, FORCE FIELDS!

      Local & Global Highscores!!

      • #1

      A Kick Ass Sound Track

      • (also a must have feature)
